message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I believe this split reflects the urgency for both of us to reach an agreement.
I think we can both do better. Let's split it more evenly, and we can both get a good chunk of the money before the value drops too much.
Bob, time is running out and the value is decreasing.  I'm willing to adjust slightly but I need you to meet me closer to my initial offer for this to work.
